page.title: 13Exton-Housing Development.
page.content: Exton is now an affluent,low density village.The old focus was around the Exton farm in a sheltered valley. Building took place along the A376 north towards Exeter ending at the old village school.This victorian development is varied including terraced houses,possibly for farm workers,and larger detached villas. Most prominent, however,is the mid-war infill between the A376 and the railway running by the estuary. These privately owned houses are mainly detached,individually designed and in extensive grounds. Recent building has been minimal merely filling-in spaces with houses of a similar price range.
